name: Spiced Averna Toddy
description: Move over, whiskey, Averna is the star of this delicious hot toddy.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce freshly squeezed juice from half a lemon

recipeInstructions.text: For the spiced syrup: Combine water, brown sugar, peppercorns, and cinnamon sticks in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to simmer, stirring, and remove from heat. Cover and let sit for an hour and a half. Strain and store in an airtight container, refrigerated, for up to two weeks.
For the cocktail: In a heat proof mug, combine Averna, spiced syrup, lemon juice, and boling water. Garnish with lemon peel and serve immediately.
